questions_and_answers.question: What should you do first if someone is experiencing an electric shock?
options: B. Touch the person to check their pulse
C. Switch off the power or remove the source of electricity
D. Give them water to drink
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Switch off the power or remove the source of electricity

questions_and_answers.question: In the case of severe bleeding, what is the immediate action you should take?
options: A. Make the patient sit up
B. Apply ice to the wound
C. Apply pressure on the wound
D. Leave the patient alone until help arrives
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Apply pressure on the wound
